string.text: Let's advance along the street. In which case you will cover me.

Thank you Strelok for helping. It was a tough fight. We will now rest. If you go further you will find the area. If you go back to the transition and go right then you get to the Bus Station. But there the ground is open and very insecure. If you go through the same area then you will be in front of the hotel. To the right the 'Monolith' base. Those guys are without a roof. The base is located in the stadium. We planned it in their way to the station. That's it.
Thanks for your help. Good luck.
